full_text:
PM @Sophie_Wilmes announces that 🇧🇪 contributes €27 million to #GlobalResponse, reiterating its strong & lasting support to international solidarity & multilateralism.

👉 A COVID19 vaccine must be accessible & affordable for all, so that no one is left behind. #StrongerTogether https://t.co/7qHconciJO
